00139    * Create shared memory segment if it doesn't exist.
00140    * This will be used to communicate current plugins loading progress to other

00142    * loading_shm[0]: Number of loaded plugins.

00146   if (loading_shmid < 0)
00147     perror ("shmget");
00148   loading_shm = shmat (loading_shmid, NULL, 0);
00149   if (loading_shm == (void *) -1)

struct arglist* nasl_plugin_add ( char *  folder,
char *  name,
struct arglist *  plugins,
struct arglist *  preferences 
) [read]

Add *one* .nasl plugin to the plugin list and return the pointer to it.

The plugin is first attempted to be loaded from the cache. If that fails, it is parsed (via exec_nasl_script) and added to the cache. If a plugin with the same (file)name is already present in the plugins arglist, it will be replaced.

Parameters:
folder Path to the plugin folder.
name File-name of the plugin (will be used as key in plugins).
plugins The arglist that the plugin shall be added to (with parameter name as the key).
preferences The plugins preferences.
Returns:
Pointer to the plugin (as arglist). NULL in case of errors.

00160       return NULL;
